snippet.title: South of the Circle | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
South of The Circle is coming soon on consoles and PCs. Find out more about the game and stay updated by adding it to your Steam wishlist:
https://rebrandly.11bitstudios.com/sw9

We’re excited and proud to announce a new jewel in 11 bit studios' lineup of meaningful entertainment titles!

South of the Circle developed by the British BAFTA-winning studio State of Play is a visually impactful and compelling narrative experience featuring a cinematic story about true love and the desire to keep our promises set in the midst of the 1960’s Cold War.

You’ll play as Peter, a climate scientist who survived a crash-landing and is now traversing across the bone freezing Antarctica. As he’s desperately holding on to his life, the memories of all the past choices that lead him up until this point start resurfacing.

The game’s beautiful aesthetic and nuanced writing underlines its sweeping cinematic scope, further enhanced by actors drawn from “Bohemian Rhapsody” (Gwilym Lee), “The Woman in White” (Olivia Vinall), “The Crown” (Richard Goulding), “Game of Thrones” (Anton Lesser), “Chernobyl” (Adrian Rawlins) and “Downton Abbey” (Michael Fox).

Get ready for a deep multi-layered cinematic experience and remember that some promises stay with you forever.
